content: this is a crochet pattern for a cute crochet basket daisy it is tiny and it would be perfect to keep a few pieces of your jewelry or some other small items the pattern includes - written instructions in us terms - abbreviations used - pattern notes - photo instructions - links to additional photo tutorials on my website for all stitches used in this pattern materials and tools you will need - yarn any thin yarn will work i used diamond 8/4 mercerized cotton 100% 50 g color 3304 lilac - crochet hook size recommended on your yarn label i used size 2 0 - tapestry needle measurements - diameter 7 0 cm - height 3 0 cm 6 0 not folded you can purchase a pdf pattern at the nordic hook shop here 1 join nordic hook club to get all ad-free patterns stitch tutorials and e-books in pdf format here 2 1 https //nordichookshop com/products/crochet-basket-daisy 2 https //nordichookclub com/sign-up/
